Class ComplexNumber

java.lang.Object
  ComplexNumber

public class ComplexNumber
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class for representing complex numbers. A ComplexNumber object is immutable.

Author:
Justin Johnson

fromReal

public static ComplexNumber fromReal(double val)
Static factory method to create a ComplexNumber from a specified real number.

Parameters:
val - The real value.
Returns:

theta - The angle.

getUnit

public static ComplexNumber getUnit(double theta)

getRootOfUnity

public static ComplexNumber getRootOfUnity(int n,
                                           int k)
Static factory method to create a root of unity.

Parameters:
n -
k -
Returns:
Returns the primitive nth root of unity to the kth power; that is e^{2 * PI * i * k / n}.

Gets the real component of this complex number.

Returns a new complex number which is the sum of this and another

Parameters:
other - The complex number to add to this.
Returns:
The sum this + other.

minus

public ComplexNumber minus(ComplexNumber other)
Returns a new complex number which is the difference of this and another complex number.

Parameters:
other - The complex number to subtract from this.
Returns:
The difference this - other.

times

public ComplexNumber times(double c)
Returns a new complex number which is a scalar multiple of this number.

Parameters:
c - The scalar by which to multiply.
Returns:
The multiple c * this.

times

public ComplexNumber times(ComplexNumber other)
Returns a new complex number which is the product of this and another complex number.

Parameters:
other - The complex number by which to multiply.
Returns:
The product this * other.

star

public ComplexNumber star()
Returns a new complex number which is the complex conjugate of this.

Returns:
A new complex number whose value is this.re() - i * this.im().

norm

public double norm()
Returns the Euclidean norm of this complex number.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String representation of this complex number.

realPart

public static double[] realPart(ComplexNumber[] nums)
Static utility method to extract the real part from an array of complex numbers.

Parameters:
nums - An array of complex numbers.
Returns:
An an array output of type double[] such that output[i] = nums[i].re()

realPart

public static double[][] realPart(ComplexNumber[][] nums)
Static utility method to extract the real part from a two-dimensional array of complex numbers.

Parameters:
nums - An array of complex numbers.
Returns:
An array output of type double[][] such that output[i][j] = nums[i][j].rea()
